title: U.S. Navy Warship and Vessel Losses of WWII
name: U.S. Navy Warship and Vessel Losses of WWII
description: This dataset contains the locations of surface warships, amphibious warfare ships, mine warfare ships, and auxiliary, service and patrol vessels lost by the U.S. Navy during WWII. Submarines are not included in this data. Data includes name of the ship, basic info (class/displacement/speed/armament), laid down/launch/commission dates, and date/cause of loss. Most information has been obtained from the following sources:Dictionary of American Fighting Ships: http://www.history.navy.mil/danfs/index.htmlNavsource Naval History: http://www.navsource.org/Data found online at http://bbs.keyhole.com/ubb/showflat.php/Cat/0/Number/713011/an/0/page/7#713011
